title: The Human machine
brief_description: Looks at the problems which confront people with physical disabilities and the ways modern technology can help them. Shows research and production of artificial limbs, the manner in which people with limited movements can become mobile and learn to communicate. Presented by James Dibble. Suitable for secondary level.
